meanings.definition: A type of plastic material used for making photographic film.
meanings.sent1: The old camera film was made of celluloid.
meanings.sent2: The photographer loaded the celluloid into the camera.
meanings.sent3: The celluloid film decided to take a selfie.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like fragile celluloid, easily torn.
meanings.sent5: The celluloid film captured the vibrant colors of the sunset.

meanings.sent1: The classic movie was recorded on celluloid.
meanings.sent2: The cinema projected the celluloid onto the screen.
meanings.sent3: The celluloid film and the projector had a chat about movies.
meanings.sent4: His dreams played out on the celluloid of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The celluloid captured the actors' emotions in vivid detail.
